column1: #Text=The polycrystalline SmFeAsO0.85 and NdFeAsO0.94F0.06 bulk samples were synthesized by solid state reaction under a high pressure [8,10].
#Text=SmAs (or NdAs, presintered) powder and Fe, Fe2O3, FeF2 powders were mixed together according to the nominal stoichiometric ratio then ground thoroughly and pressed into small pellets.
#Text=The pellets were sealed in boron nitride crucibles and sintered in a high pressure synthesis apparatus under the pressure of 6 GPa at 1250°C for 2 hours.
